title: Drawing, "Laudolph (Lolo) Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: E. McKnight Kauffer.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: Laudolph
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A man, standing frontally, with dark cropped hair, wearing a green tunic with a blue collar and a black cape around his shoulders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Laudolph (Lolo) Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925.
1925. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-173.
